mapper.insert: insert into operation_log_t( order_id, type, content, log_time, oper_user_id, oper_user_name, jude_way_channel, gate_way_channel, channel, category ) values ( #{order_id}, #{type}, #{content}, str_to_date(#{log_time}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'), #{oper_user_id}, #{oper_user_name}, #{jude_way_channel}, #{gate_way_channel}, #{channel}, #{category} )
